subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Adam Hansen of Australia won the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia with a solo breakaway, and Beñat Intxausti of Spain took the overall lead by five seconds over Vincenzo Nibali.
snippet: Adam Hansen of Australia won the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia with a solo breakaway, and Beñat Intxausti of Spain took the overall lead by five seconds over Vincenzo Nibali.
